bibl.title: Egypt after the Pharaohs, 332 BC - AD 642, from Alexander to the Arab Conquest.
bibl.seg: Bowman Alan K., Egypt after the Pharaohs, 332 BC - AD 642, from Alexander to the Arab Conquest.
London, British Museum Publications, 1986, 8°, 364 pp., 1 front. coul., 144 figg. n./bl. et coul., 2 cartes, 2 tabl.

C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, AJA 91 (1987) pp. 623-624. - Giovanni Geraci, Aegyptus 68 (1988) pp. 272-275. - J.J. Paterson, G&R 34 (1987) pp. 222-223. - Charles C. Van Siclen III, Varia Aegyptiaca 3 (1987) pp. 86-88. - Helen Whitehouse, CR N.S., 37 (1987) pp. 257-259. - Willy Clarysse, JEA 76 (1990) pp. 249-250. - Hans Goedicke, CW 82 (1989) p. 310. - Heinz Heinen, BJb 189 (1989) pp. 651-655. - Reingold Scholl, BibO 47 (1990) coll. 133-135. - John Whitehorne, AH 19 (1989) fasc. 2, pp. 94-96. - E.M. Yamauchi, Libraries & Culture 23 (1988) pp. 83-85 (non vidimus). - C.M. Bailey, AntJ 68 (1988) pp. 351-352. - Izabela Biezunska-Malowist, Gnomon 63 (1991) pp. 466-468. - Fernández, Gerión 6 (1988) p. 296 (non vid.). - Dominic Rathbone, EHR 104 (1989) p. 1002. - Ausilia Saija, APapyrol 2 (1990) p. 161. - Iza Biezunska-Malowist, Przeglad historyczny 81 (1990) pp. 325-327. - Y. Koenig, RHist 114 (1990) t. 285, No. 575, pp. 230-231.
